name: bls-signatures-pod
summary: BLS signatures in C++, using the relic toolkit
description: Implements BLS signatures with aggregation as in Boneh, Drijvers, Neven 2018, using relic toolkit for cryptographic primitives (pairings, EC, hashing). The BLS12-381 curve is used.
prepare_command:
# build relic

pushd contrib/relic

MD5_HASH="862455e976646e3b0f449cbd9b35302c"
curl -o ios.toolchain.cmake https://raw.githubusercontent.com/leetal/ios-cmake/6ea5db18f9a05b4103e2aca665374b94c119fbed/ios.toolchain.cmake
DOWNLOADED_HASH=`md5 -q ios.toolchain.cmake`
if [ $MD5_HASH != $DOWNLOADED_HASH ]; then
  echo "Error: md5 checksum of ios.toolchain.cmake mismatch" >&2
  exit 1
fi

ARM_TARGET_DIR="relic-target-arm"
X86_TARGET_DIR="relic-target-x86"
I386_TARGET_DIR="relic-target-i386"


mkdir "$ARM_TARGET_DIR"
pushd "$ARM_TARGET_DIR"

export CC=`xcrun --sdk iphoneos --find clang`

ARCHFLAGS="-arch arm64"
SYSROOT=`xcrun --sdk iphoneos --show-sdk-path`

cmake -DTESTS=0 -DBENCH=0 -DCHECK=off -DARITH=easy -DFP_PRIME=381 -DFP_QNRES=off -DFP_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;INTEG;MONTY;LOWER;SLIDE" -DFPX_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;LAZYR" -DPP_METHD="LAZYR;OATEP" -DCOMP="-O3 -funroll-loops -fomit-frame-pointer $INCLUDES -isysroot $SYSROOT $ARCHFLAGS -fembed-bitcode" -DWSIZE=64 -DVERBS=off -DSHLIB=off -DALLOC="AUTO" -DDSEED="UDEV" -DEP_PLAIN=off -DEP_SUPER=off -DPP_EXT="LAZYR" -DTIMER="HREAL" -DARCH=ARM -DOPSYS=NONE -DIOS_PLATFORM=OS64 -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=../ios.toolchain.cmake ../
make

popd # "$ARM_TARGET_DIR"


mkdir "$X86_TARGET_DIR"
pushd "$X86_TARGET_DIR"

unset CC
export CC=`xcrun --sdk macosx --find clang`

ARCHFLAGS="-arch x86_64"
SYSROOT=`xcrun --sdk macosx --show-sdk-path`

cmake -DTESTS=0 -DBENCH=0 -DCHECK=off -DARITH=easy -DFP_PRIME=381 -DFP_QNRES=off -DFP_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;INTEG;MONTY;LOWER;SLIDE" -DFPX_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;LAZYR" -DPP_METHD="LAZYR;OATEP" -DCOMP="-O3 -funroll-loops -fomit-frame-pointer $INCLUDES -isysroot $SYSROOT $ARCHFLAGS -fembed-bitcode" -DWSIZE=64 -DVERBS=off -DSHLIB=off -DALLOC="AUTO" -DDSEED="UDEV" -DEP_PLAIN=off -DEP_SUPER=off -DPP_EXT="LAZYR" -DTIMER="HREAL" ../
make

popd # "$X86_TARGET_DIR"


mkdir "$I386_TARGET_DIR"
pushd "$I386_TARGET_DIR"

unset CC
export CC=`xcrun --sdk macosx --find clang`

ARCHFLAGS="-arch i386"
SYSROOT=`xcrun --sdk macosx --show-sdk-path`

cmake -DTESTS=0 -DBENCH=0 -DCHECK=off -DARITH=easy -DFP_PRIME=381 -DFP_QNRES=off -DFP_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;INTEG;MONTY;LOWER;SLIDE" -DFPX_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;LAZYR" -DPP_METHD="LAZYR;OATEP" -DCOMP="-O3 -funroll-loops -fomit-frame-pointer $INCLUDES -isysroot $SYSROOT $ARCHFLAGS -fembed-bitcode" -DWSIZE=32 -DVERBS=off -DSHLIB=off -DALLOC="AUTO" -DDSEED="UDEV" -DEP_PLAIN=off -DEP_SUPER=off -DPP_EXT="LAZYR" -DTIMER="HREAL" ../
make

popd # "$I386_TARGET_DIR"


xcrun lipo -create "${ARM_TARGET_DIR}/lib/librelic_s.a" "${X86_TARGET_DIR}/lib/librelic_s.a" "${I386_TARGET_DIR}/lib/librelic_s.a" -output "librelic_universal.a"

sed '/#define WSIZE/d' relic-target-arm/include/relic_conf.h > relic-target-arm/include/relic_conf.h.new
rm relic-target-arm/include/relic_conf.h
mv relic-target-arm/include/relic_conf.h.new relic-target-arm/include/relic_conf.h

popd # contrib/relic
